item.title: Wireless Audio Control Interface - WACI
item.description: This project was completed in Fall of 2019 as a senior capstone design project for the EECE department at Northeastern University. Included here is the abstract and associated project materials to serve as part of my portfolio. Thanks to group members Joshua Berlin, Jess Bardio, Matan Silver, Phil Del Signore, and Lousia Beckwith, as well as advisor Professor Bahram Shafai. +++ +++ Abstract Musicians are increasingly utilizing digital effects to create unique sounds during live performances.

item.title: Welcome! - Adventure edition
item.description: Welcome Please bear with me as I get the site all set up. “Adventure is out there!” - Russell

item.title: themecredit
item.description: This website is a personal homepage. The site is built with Hugoâ€”a static site generator made with Go. The website source code is available on GitHub. It uses the cocoa theme. The posts are written in Markdown. The primary font face is Open Sans and the monospace font face is Ubuntu Mono. The social icons are from the Ionicons font set. CSS classes for code syntax highlighting are inserted during compile-time by Hugo using Pygments.
